items.title: Cashew identified as increasingly relevant allergen triggering anaphylaxis in children
items.description: Cashew is an increasingly relevant allergen leading to anaphylaxis in children, according to a study published online June 13 in Allergy.

items.title: 'It just makes you feel less alone': Using the power of play to break menopause taboos in the workplace
items.description: Health psychologists from the University of Staffordshire have adopted a novel approach to support women going through the menopause.
